name: Coins, Chests and Loot
description:
Looking for a clicker-style incremental game with active, strategic skill-based gameplay instead of idling around doing nothing? You've come to the right place! Successfully complete bullet-hell minigames to open chests and earn currency to buy upgrades!

Make tactical decisions and play well to get coins and loot to well... open more chests!

Featuring a campaign with custom designed levels to challenge you and an endless mode to mess about in! Both modes earn you coins and diamonds you can use to upgrade your skills.

NO IN-APP PURCHASES! This is the complete game and you earn double the meta-currency on this version compared to the Android version :) I hope you enjoy the game!
